Html:
I have a problem with template. I developed my web app on Xampp for Windows and it work fine.

After I deployed (I'm using symfony) on Xampp for Linux (Ubuntu) and I do not have errors, but the template loaded is empty.

I checked phpinfo in windows and linux and they are similar (I saw xml and zip extension)

On linux I have PHP 5.3.5 and on windows PHP 5.2.9. Could be this the reason? I don't think.

I'm looking for eventually permission problem but I don't see nothing.

Do you have any idea?

Thanks
